ApiEndpoint.Name: API Endpoint
ApiEndpoint.Hint: The base URL for the OpenAI-compatible API. Examples: https://api.openai.com/v1 (OpenAI), http://localhost:11434/v1 (Ollama)

ApiKey.Name: API Key
ApiKey.Hint: Your API key. Leave empty for local models like Ollama that don't require authentication.

Model.Name: Model
Model.Hint: The model to use for generation. Examples: gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4o, llama3.2, mistral

PromptTemplate.Name: Prompt Template
PromptTemplate.Hint: The prompt template used to generate fake information. Use {{name}}, {{level}}, {{traits}}, {{weaknesses}}, {{resistances}}, {{immunities}}, {{abilities}}, {{notes}} as placeholders.
PromptTemplate.Label: Prompt Template

Errors.WrongSystem: PF2e Fake ID requires the PF2e game system.
Errors.NoApiEndpoint: No API endpoint configured. Please configure the module settings.
Errors.NoCreature: No creature found to generate information for.
Errors.NetworkError: Network error: Could not reach the API endpoint.
Errors.NotGM: Only the GM can use this feature.
